name: SNACK ATTACK! (StardustDev)
description:
"It seems like you decided to start acting healthy. Good for you! Unfortunately, your past meals haven't taken your abandonment so lightly and they want you gone! They see you have a tendency to survive... Let's test the outer limits of that talent!"

To Install:

Linux: Download the .Appimage and .Pck Files

Windows: Download and run the.exe file

Mac OS: Extract and Run
